content.raw:
Let me add a note about going into ubuntu (once the SDF part is done):

The plan is trying to go into Debian first and reach ubuntu from Debian. Estimated time for this is completely unknown since they are procedures, specially Debian, which requires to find someone inside Debian developer community to take care of the inclusion which could trigger days or months.
content.html:
Let me add a note about going into ubuntu (once the SDF part is done):

The plan is trying to go into Debian first and reach ubuntu from Debian. Estimated time for this is completely unknown since they are procedures, specially Debian, which requires to find someone inside Debian developer community to take care of the inclusion which could trigger days or months.
